paragraph: Natsuiro (なついろ) was a Japanese music unit under Giza Studio in their sublabel D-Go.
Yoshimi Yamazaki (山崎好詩未) - keyboardist and lyricist
In 2012, jazz singer Natsuki Morikawa formed music unit with Yoshimi Yamazaki and Kana Kitagawa
At same year, they've made major debut with single Kimi no Namida ni Koishiteru which was used as opening theme for anime Detective Conan

In October 2016 through official website unit has announced hiatus from their music activitiesYoshimi has announced on her blog retiring from modeling and music activities, Natsuki continues with her solo jazz activities  and Kana supports indies band Hachi as keyboardist
During their career, they've released 2 singles and 2 studio albums
